EOA.title: EOA Game System
EOA.AbilityUseHint: Configure how you would like to use the {name} {type}.
EOA.AbilityUseUnavailableHint: There are no uses of this item remaining!
EOA.AbilityUseChargedHint: This {type} is charged and ready to use!
EOA.AbilityUseRechargeHint: This {type} is depleted and must be recharged!
EOA.AbilityUseNormalHint: This {type} has {value} of {max} uses per {per} remaining.
EOA.AbilityUseConsumableChargeHint: Using this {type} will consume 1 charge of {value} remaining.
EOA.AbilityUseConsumableQuantityHint: Using this {type} will consume 1 quantity of {quantity} remaining
EOA.AbilityUseConsumableDestroyHint: Using this {type} will consume its final charge and it will be destroyed.
EOA.AbilityUseConsumableDestroyResourceH: Using this {type} will consume the final charge off {name} and destroy it.
EOA.AbilityConfigure: Configure Ability Checks and Saving Throws
EOA.AbilityConfigurationHint: Configure ability saving throw proficiency, saving throw bonuses, and check bonuses.
EOA.AbilityCheckGlobalBonusHint: This bonus applies to all ability checks made by this actor.
EOA.ActionWarningNoItem: The requested item {item} no longer exists on Actor {name}
EOA.ActionWarningNoToken: You must have one or more controlled Tokens in order to use this option.
EOA.ActorWarningInvalidItem: {itemType} items cannot be added to a {actorType}.
EOA.ActorWarningSingleton: Only a single {itemType} can be added to a {actorType}.
EOA.ActiveEffectOverrideWarning: This value is being modified by an Active Effect and cannot be edited. Disable the effect to edit it.
EOA.AddEmbeddedItemPromptHint: Do you want to add these items to your character sheet?
EOA.AdvancementAbilityScoreImprovementHi: Allow the player to increase one or more ability scores or take an optional feat.
EOA.AdvancementAbilityScoreImprovementCa: Maximum number of points a player can assign to a single score.
EOA.AdvancementAbilityScoreImprovementFe: Drop a feat here to choose one instead of an ability score improvement.
Only features with the 'feat' type can be selected.
EOA.AdvancementAbilityScoreImprovementLo: Scores cannot be modified with a feat selected.
EOA.AdvancementAbilityScoreImprovementPo: Number of points that can be assigned to any ability score that doesn't have a fixed improvement set.
EOA.AdvancementConfigureAllowDropsHint: Should players be able to drop their own choices into this advancement?
EOA.AdvancementConfigureDropAreaHint: Drop Items here to add them to the pool from which a player can choose.
EOA.AdvancementDeleteConfirmationMessage: Deleting this item will also delete all advancement choices made for it. These changes will be removed from your character as long as the checkbox below is checked.
EOA.AdvancementFlowDropAreaHint: Drop an Item here to choose it.
EOA.AdvancementHitPointsHint: Track the player's hit points for each level in the class.
EOA.AdvancementHitPointsEmptyError: Hit points must be rolled or the average value must be taken.
EOA.AdvancementHitPointsInvalidError: Hit points must be a valid whole number.
EOA.AdvancementItemChoiceHint: Present the player with a choice of items (such as equipment, features, or spells) that they can choose for their character at one or more levels.
EOA.AdvancementItemChoiceLevelsHint: Specify how many choices are allowed at each level.
EOA.AdvancementItemChoicePreviouslyChose: This item has already been chosen at a previous level.
EOA.AdvancementItemChoiceSpellLevelAvail: Only {level} or lower spells can be chosen for this advancement.
EOA.AdvancementItemChoiceSpellLevelSpeci: Only {level} spells can be chosen for this advancement.
EOA.AdvancementItemChoiceSpellLevelHint: Only allow choices from spells of this level.
EOA.AdvancementItemChoiceTypeHint: Restrict what Item types can be choosen.
EOA.AdvancementItemChoiceTypeWarning: Only {type} items can be selected for this choice.
EOA.AdvancementItemGrantHint: Grant the character items (such as equipment, features, or spells) when they reach a certain level.
EOA.AdvancementItemGrantDropHint: Drop Items here to add them to the list granted by this advancement.
EOA.AdvancementItemGrantDuplicateWarning: That item already exists on this advancement.
EOA.AdvancementItemGrantRecursiveWarning: You cannot grant an item in its own advancement.
EOA.AdvancementItemGrantOptionalHint: If optional, players will be given the option to opt out of any of the following items, otherwise all of them are granted.
EOA.AdvancementItemTypeInvalidWarning: {type} items cannot be added with this advancement type.
EOA.AdvancementLevelDownConfirmationMess: Leveling this class down will also undo all advancement choices made for it. These changes will be removed from your character as long as the checkbox below is checked.
EOA.AdvancementManagerCloseMessage: If the advancement process is cancelled, choices made so far will be discarded and no changes will be made to the actor.
EOA.AdvancementManagerRestartConfirm: Are you sure you wish to undo all choices so far?
EOA.AdvancementMigrationHint: Select which of the following advancements will be added to {name}.
EOA.AdvancementScaleValueHint: A single value that changes as a class increases in level that is made available in roll formulas (such as a Monk's martial arts die).
EOA.AdvancementScaleValueIdentifierHint: This scale value for the current level will be available using @scale.{class}.{identifier} in a formula.
EOA.AdvancementScaleValueTypeHintCR: Use this for representing creature challenge ratings for features like Wild Shape.
EOA.AdvancementScaleValueTypeHintDice: Use this for dice values like bardic inspiration, sneak attack, or superiority dice.
EOA.AdvancementScaleValueTypeHintDistanc: Use this for numerical values that represent a distance, such as unarmored movement speed, or aura of protection radius.
EOA.AdvancementScaleValueTypeHintNumber: Use this for purely numerical values like rage damage bonus or number of uses per day.
EOA.AdvancementScaleValueTypeHintString: Use this if you are unsure of the type of the scale values, or if the type does not matter.
EOA.AdvancementTraitHint: Grant a character certain traits or give them an option to select traits (such as proficiencies, skills, languages).
EOA.AdvancementTraitAllowReplacementsHin: If a trait is already set on the actor, allow the player to choose from any other trait as a replacement.
EOA.AdvancementTraitChoicesHint: The following traits will be presented as a choice to the player.
EOA.AdvancementTraitGrantsHint: The following traits will be granted to the character as long as they don't already possess that trait.
EOA.AdvancementTraitModeExpertiseHint: Gain expertise in a trait in which you already have proficiency.
EOA.AdvancementTraitModeForceHint: Gain expertise in a trait regardless of your previous proficiency level.
EOA.AdvancementTraitModeUpgradeHint: Gain proficiency in a trait unless you already have it, otherwise gain expertise.
EOA.ArmorConfigHint: Fill in the above box to override automatically calculated armor class.
EOA.BonusesHint: Define global bonuses as formulas which are added to certain rolls. For example: 1d4 + 2
EOA.BonusesInstructions: Configure character bonuses which are added to the appropriate dice roll
EOA.ClassIdentifierHint: This class's data will be accessible using @classes.{identifier} in roll formulas.
EOA.ClassMakeOriginalHint: First class taken by character used to determine certain class traits when multiclassing.
EOA.ConsumeWarningNoResource: {name} is designated to consume {type} but no resource is specified!
EOA.ConsumeWarningNoSource: The designated {type} source that {name} consumes no longer exists!
EOA.ConsumeWarningNoQuantity: {name} has run out of its designated {type}!
EOA.ConsumeWarningZeroAttribute: {name} has run out of its designated attribute resource pool!
EOA.ConsumeScalingTooltip: If checked, consuming additional resources will increase the level the spell is cast at.
EOA.ConsumableLastChargeWarn: This is the last charge of this unit and consuming it will also reduce the item's quantity by 1
EOA.CurrencyConvertHint: Convert all carried currency to the highest possible denomination to reduce the amount of coinage carried by the character. Be wary, this action cannot be undone.
EOA.DamagePhysicalBypassHint: These weapon properties will bypass damage resistance for physical damage.
EOA.DeathSaveCriticalSuccess: {name} critically succeeded on a death saving throw and has regained 1 Hit Point!
EOA.DeathSaveSuccess: {name} has survived with 3 death save successes and is now stable!
EOA.DeathSaveFailure: {name} has died with 3 death save failures!
EOA.DeathSaveUnnecessary: You do not need to roll death saves because you have a positive number of hit points or have already reached 3 successes or failures.
EOA.EffectUnavailableInfo: Source item must be equipped or attuned to activate these
EOA.FilterNoSpells: No spells found for this set of filters.
EOA.NoSpellLevels: This character has no spellcaster levels, but you may add spells manually.
EOA.FlagsInstructions: Configure character features and traits which fine-tune behaviors of the EOA system.
EOA.FlagsDiamondSoulHint: Gain proficiency to all saving throws.
EOA.FlagsElvenAccuracyHint: Roll an extra d20 with advantage to Dex, Int, Wis, or Cha.
EOA.FlagsHalflingLuckyHint: Reroll ones when rolling d20 checks.
EOA.FlagsInitiativeAdvHint: Provided by feats or magical items.
EOA.FlagsJOATHint: Half-Proficiency to Ability Checks in which you are not already Proficient.
EOA.FlagsObservantHint: Provides a +5 to passive Perception and Investigation.
EOA.FlagsRemarkableAthleteHint: Half-Proficiency (rounded-up) to physical Ability Checks and Initiative.
EOA.FlagsWeaponCritThresholdHint: An expanded critical hit threshold for weapon attacks.
EOA.FlagsSpellCritThresholdHint: An expanded critical hit threshold for spell attacks.
EOA.FlagsMeleeCriticalDiceHint: A number of additional damage dice added to melee weapon critical hits.
EOA.FormulaMissingReferenceWarn: The {property} formula within {name} has references to missing data: {references}
EOA.HPFormulaError: The provided hit point formula could not be evaluated.
EOA.HitDiceConfigHint: Adjust remaining hit dice levels for each class.
EOA.HitDiceWarn: {name} has no available {formula} Hit Dice remaining!
EOA.IdentifierError: Identifier can only contain letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), dashes (-), and underscores (_).
EOA.InitiativeConfigHint: Configure initiative modifiers and bonuses which apply to this Actor.
EOA.ItemDestroyEmptyTooltip: If this item has limited uses, it will be destroyed when none are left.
EOA.ItemRecoveryFormulaWarning: Unable to recover charges for {name}. Invalid recovery formula '{formula}'.
EOA.LimitedUsesPromptTooltip: If unchecked, the prompt to consume an available use will be suppressed.
EOA.LongRestHint: Take a long rest? On a long rest you will recover hit points, half your maximum hit dice, class resources, limited use item charges, and spell slots.
EOA.LongRestResult: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {health} Hit Points and {dice} Hit Dice.
EOA.LongRestResultHitDice: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {dice} Hit Dice.
EOA.LongRestResultHitPoints: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {health} Hit Points.
EOA.MaxCharacterLevelExceededWarn: Character cannot be advanced past level {max}.
EOA.MaxClassLevelExceededWarn: Class cannot be advanced past level {max}.
EOA.MaxClassLevelMinimumWarn: Class must have at least one level.
EOA.ModuleArtConfigH: Configure which module-provided art should be used.
EOA.Name: Character Name
EOA.PolymorphKeepAE: Keep all effects (overrides other effect retention options).
EOA.PolymorphKeepBackgroundAE: Keep effects that originate from your background?
EOA.PolymorphKeepClass: Keep proficiency bonus (leaves class items in sheet)
EOA.PolymorphKeepClassAE: Keep effects that originate from your class or subclass?
EOA.PolymorphKeepEquipmentAE: Keep effects that originate from your equipment?
EOA.PolymorphKeepFeatureAE: Keep effects that originate from your features?
EOA.PolymorphKeepMental: Keep mental ability scores (Int, Wis, Cha)
EOA.PolymorphKeepOriginAE: Keep effects that originate from this actor (i.e. effects not attached to features, items, spells)
EOA.PolymorphKeepOtherOriginAE: Keep effects that originate from a different actor?
EOA.PolymorphKeepPhysical: Keep physical ability scores (Str, Dex, Con)
EOA.PolymorphKeepSelf: Keep self (just change image and size i.e. for spells like Disguise Self)
EOA.PolymorphKeepSpellAE: Keep effects that originate from your spells?
EOA.PolymorphMergeSaves: Merge saving throw proficiencies (take the highest)
EOA.PolymorphRevertNoOriginalActorWarn: No original actor was found with reference '{reference}'
EOA.PolymorphRevertWarn: You do not have permission to revert this Actor's polymorphed state.
EOA.PolymorphWarn: You are not allowed to polymorph this actor!
EOA.MovementConfigHint: Configure movement speed and special movement attributes.
EOA.NewDayHint: Recover limited use abilities which recharge "per day"?
EOA.SaveGlobalBonusHint: This bonus applies to all saving throws made by this actor.
EOA.SensesConfigHint: Configure any special sensory perception abilities that this actor possesses.
EOA.ShortRestHint: Take a short rest? On a short rest you may spend remaining Hit Dice and recover primary or secondary resources.
EOA.ShortRestResult: {name} takes a short rest spending {dice} Hit Dice to recover {health} Hit Points.
EOA.SkillGlobalBonusCheckHint: This bonus applies to all skill checks made by this actor.
EOA.SpellCastNoSlots: You have no available {level} spell slots with which to cast {name}
EOA.SpellCastNoSlotsLeft: You have no available spell slots with which to cast {name}!
EOA.SubclassIdentifierHint: This identifier should match the identifier on the parent class to ensure they are properly linked.
EOA.SubclassAssignmentError: {class} already has a subclass. Remove the existing '{subclass}' subclass before adding a new one.
EOA.SubclassDuplicateError: A subclass with the identifier {identifier} already exists on this actor.
EOA.SubclassMismatchWarn: {name} subclass has no matching class with identifier '{class}'.
EOA.TemplatePromptTooltip: If unchecked, the prompt for placing a Measured Template will be suppressed.
EOA.VehicleActionsHint: Actions taken with full crew complement
EOA.WarnBadACFormula: The provided AC formula could not be evaluated.
EOA.WarnCantAddMultipleAdvancements: It is not currently possible to add multiple items with advancements to an actor at the same time. Please add them individually.
EOA.WarnMultipleArmor: More than one suit of armor equipped, AC calculation may be incorrect.
EOA.WarnMultipleShields: More than one shield equipped, AC calculation may be incorrect.
EOA.description: A system for playing the fifth edition of the worlds most popular roleplaying game in the Foundry Virtual Tabletop environment.
EDITOR.EOA.Inline.NoActorWarning: No selected or assigned actor could be found to execute this roll.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.EOA.Class.AdditionalEqu: List of equipment granted by this class if taken at first level.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.EOA.Class.AdditionalHit: Additional descriptive text displayed beneath the auto-generated hit points section.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.EOA.Class.AdditionalTra: Additional descriptive text displayed beneath list of proficiencies granted by this class.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.EOA.Class.DescriptionHi: Primary description of the class that will appear first.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.EOA.Class.FeaturesDescr: As a {lowercaseName}, you gain the following class features, which are summarized in the {name} table.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.EOA.Class.HitPointsLeve: Hit Points at 1st Level: {max} + your Constitution modifier
Hit Points at Higher Levels: {dice} (or {average}) + your Constitution modifier per {class} level after 1st
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.EOA.Class.NoValidClass: No valid class selected, press the edit button to add a class.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.EOA.Class.OptionalFeatu: The following section contains options {class} features. These features are not granted automatically, and you can choose one, some, or all of them at your DM's discretion.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.EOA.Class.SubclassDescr: Introduction that will be displayed before this class's subclasses.
MACRO.EoAMissingTargetWarn: Your controlled actor '{actor}' does not have an {type} with name '{name}'.
MACRO.EoAMultipleTargetsWarn: Your controlled actor '{actor}' has more than one {type} with name '{name}'. The first match will be chosen.
MACRO.EoANoActorSelected: No selected or assigned actor could be found to target with macro.
MACRO.EoAUnownedWarn: You can only create macro buttons for owned Items
MIGRATION.EoABegin: Applying EOA System Migration for version {version}. Please be patient and do not close your game or shut down your server.
MIGRATION.EoAComplete: EOA System Migration to version {version} completed!
MIGRATION.EoAVersionTooOldWarning: Your EOA system data is from too old a Foundry version and cannot be reliably migrated to the latest version. The process will be attempted, but errors may occur.
SETTINGS.eoaAllowPolymorphingL: Allow players to polymorph their own actors.
SETTINGS.eoaAutoCollapseCardL: Automatically collapse Item Card descriptions in the Chat Log
SETTINGS.eoaAutoSpellTemplateL: When a spell is cast, defaults to begin the process to create the corresponding Measured Template if any (requires TRUSTED or higher player role)
SETTINGS.eoaCriticalMaxDiceL: Make critical hits more deadly by maximizing the values of base damage dice.
SETTINGS.eoaCriticalModifiersL: Make critical hits more deadly by multiplying non-dice modifiers in addition to rolled dice.
SETTINGS.eoaCurWtL: Carried currency affects character encumbrance following the rules on PHB pg. 143.
SETTINGS.eoaDiagL: Configure which diagonal movement rule should be used for games within this system.
SETTINGS.eoaFeatsL: Allow players to choose a feat rather than taking an ability score improvement during class advancement.
SETTINGS.eoaHonorL: Enable the use of the optional Honor ability score. Requires the world to be reloaded.
SETTINGS.eoaInitTBL: Append the raw Dexterity ability score to break ties in Initiative.
SETTINGS.eoaMetricL: Replaces all reference to lbs with kgs and updates the encumbrance calculations to use metric weight units.
SETTINGS.eoaNoAdvancementsL: Do not prompt for level-up or character creation choices.
SETTINGS.eoaNoExpL: Remove experience bars from character sheets.
SETTINGS.eoaProfL: Configure proficiency modifier to use a fixed bonus or a dice roll. Reloading the world is required for this change to take effect.
SETTINGS.eoaRestL: Configure which rest variant should be used for games within this system.
SETTINGS.eoaGridAlignedSquareTemplatesL: When square templates are created as the result of casting a spell or using an item, they will be locked to the grid alignment and unable to be rotated.
SETTINGS.eoaSanityL: Enable the use of the optional Sanity ability score. Requires the world to be reloaded.

SETTINGS_FORM.Name: Dice Roller Settings
SETTINGS_FORM.Hint: Displays settings form for Dice Roller

OPTION_SHOW_SEND_TO_COMBAT_TRACKER.Name: Show Send to Combat Tracker
OPTION_SHOW_SEND_TO_COMBAT_TRACKER.Hint: Display option to send result as Initiative to Combat Tracker for controlled tokens

OPTION_HARD_MODE.Name: FUv2/NCO/Action!Tale: Hard Mode
OPTION_HARD_MODE.Hint: In hard mode each Danger die cancels all Action dice with a matching value

OPTION_BOTCH_VALUE.Name: FUv2/NCO/Action!Tale: Botch Value
OPTION_BOTCH_VALUE.Hint: The numerical value of a Botch(Standard FU2 is 1)

OPTION_FU_CLASSIC_MATCHING_DICE.Name: FU Classic: Matching Dice
OPTION_FU_CLASSIC_MATCHING_DICE.Hint: Rolling doubles, triples or quadruples etc makes a success better or a failure worse

OPTION_CUSTOM_ACTION_DICE_ICON.Name: Custom Action Dice Icon
OPTION_CUSTOM_ACTION_DICE_ICON.Hint: Path to custom icon for Action Dice. Leave blank for default

OPTION_CUSTOM_DANGER_DICE_ICON.Name: Custom Edge Dice Icon
OPTION_CUSTOM_DANGER_DICE_ICON.Hint: Path to custom icon for Edge Dice. Leave blank for default

OPTION_CUSTOM_AUGMENT_DICE_ICON.Name: Custom Augment Dice Icon
OPTION_CUSTOM_AUGMENT_DICE_ICON.Hint: Path to custom icon for Augment Dice. Leave blank for default
